register_form.policy_service: By clicking “Continue” I agree to Bothub of Service and Privacy Policy.

landing_page.header_content2: Be part of an open source and democratic global community that builds, trains and shares datasets.
landing_page.grid_text2: Create intelligences with example sentences contextualized.
landing_page.grid_text4: You can choose from various ready-to-use datasets.
landing_page.grid_text6: Contribute to existing datasets adding more examples or new language support.
landing_page.signup_grid: Join the developers community already using Bothub
landing_page.reset_password_success: Check your email, we've sent you the instructions to reset your password.

safari_alert.title1: Sorry, the Safari browser is not compatible with all our features.
safari_alert.title2: We strongly recommend that you switch to a different browser.

analyze_text.grid1: Make a HTTP request to NLP service, follow the example below.
analyze_text.code_generator_text: Generate code to your respective programming language.
analyze_text.notification_info: Sign in to your account to contribute to this repository.

quick_test.error_quick_test: An error ocurred, we couldn't analyze your text

debug.debug_description: Something unexpected happened! We couldn't debug your text.

evaluate.header_title_p: How is your model performing? Do you have enough data? Are your intents and entities well-designed?
evaluate.header_title_p2: Using our testing feature, you can evaluate your bot's performance easily.
evaluate.header_title_lang: Select the language to run the test
evaluate.you_can_not_edit: You can not edit this repository
evaluate.login: Sign in to your account to edit this repository.
evaluate.create_a_bench_of_test: Create a bench of test sentences to measure the accuracy of your training.
evaluate.you_need_type_a_text: You need type a text to sentence
evaluate.not_have_results: You do not have results yet

result.evaluate_output_text: For more information about test results, see our
result.recall_reports_text: A perfect precision score of 1.0 means that every test result was positive (but says nothing about whether all positive results were retrieved) whereas a perfect recall score of 1.0 means that all positive results were retrieved by the search (but says nothing about how many false positives were also retrieved).
result.intent_confusion_matrix_text: The confusion matrix shows you which intents are mistaken for others. Read more about it in our
result.intent_confidence_distribution_text: The histogram allows you to visualize the confidence distribution for all predictions, with the volume of correct and incorrect predictions being displayed by green and red bars respectively. Improving the quality of your training data will move the green histogram bars to the right and the red histogram bars to the left of the plot.
result.sentence_details_text: Compare the results in every test sentence

home.no_description: There is no description for this repository

settings.not_can_edit_repository: You can not edit this intelligence
settings.login: Sign in to your account to edit this intelligence.

example.help_text: When your bot receives a message, your bot can use a recognizer to examine the message and determine intent.
example.delete_text: Are you sure? The example will be deleted.

trainings.grid_text2: Add examples to improve your intelligence.
trainings.not_can_edit_repository: You can not contribute to this intelligence
trainings.login: Sign in to your account to contribute to this intelligence.
trainings.highlight_word: Highlight words to mark as entity
trainings.delete_phrase_modal: Are you sure? The example will be deleted
trainings.empty_text_error: You need type a text to sentence

train_modal.status_ok: Your bot is ready to be trained!
train_modal.language_warning: One or more languages cannot be trained in the moment.

translate.not_can_edit_repository: You can not contribute to this intelligence
translate.login: Sign in to your account to contribute to this intelligence.

tutorial.grid1: On the top right of the window, click the "New bot" button.
tutorial.grid2: Fill in the fields and click on "Create Bot"
tutorial.grid3:
Start adding content to the interpretation mechanism
              by providing example sentences.
tutorial.grid4:
Choose "Training" and enter phrases highlighting the entities and relating it to an intention.

Don't forget to submit your sentences.,
tutorial.grid5:
After adding your examples, click the status bar to see
            the status of your bot and train the sentences
tutorial.grid6: That's it! Your bot is ready to be used!

versions.edit_choose_version: Add, edit and choose versions of your intelligence.
versions.message_change_default_version: Are you sure you want to change this default version?
versions.you_cannot_delete_main_branch: You cannot delete the main version
versions.message_deleting_version: Are you sure you want to delete this version? This action cannot be undone.

These are phrases of actual user interaction with your data set.
          They can be useful for your training or testing.
